message.content:
I need to identify the profit amount that an entity retains after all expenses have been deducted from the total revenue, along with 5 component sub-items from the income statement.

Looking at the income statement, I can see that "Net Profit" represents the amount of profit retained after all expenses are deducted, which is -2035736.52.

For the 5 component sub-items that contribute to this calculation, I'll select:

1. Total Revenue: 6836701.10 (the starting point)
2. Cost of Goods Sold: 5700000.00 (direct costs of producing goods)
3. Total Expenses: 2835757.88 (all operating expenses)
4. Interest Income: 5155.34 (additional income)
5. Tax Expense: 341835.08 (final deduction before net profit)

The calculation flows as:
Total Revenue - Cost of Goods Sold = Gross Profit
Gross Profit - Total Expenses + Interest Income = Profit Before Tax
Profit Before Tax - Tax Expense = Net Profit

```json
{"solution": {'value': '-2035736.52', 'sub_items': {'sub_item value1': '6836701.10', 'sub_item value2': '5700000.00', 'sub_item value3': '2835757.88', 'sub_item value4': '5155.34', 'sub_item value5': '341835.08'}}}
```
